titles.title: Broadcast Diversity in Leadership Act
Broadcast Diversity in Leadership Act

To direct the Federal Communications Commission to establish a broadcast incubator program to support the entry of new and diverse voices in the broadcasting industry by providing for an established broadcaster and an emerging broadcaster to enter into a qualifying incubation relationship.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Broadcast Diversity in Leadership Act
This bill requires the Federal Communications Commission to establish the Broadcast Incubator Program to provide a mechanism for an established broadcaster and an emerging broadcaster to enter into an incubation relationship that supports the entry of new and diverse voices in the broadcasting industry.
